entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Fort McMurray
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:50 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort McMurray Airport 1:24 PM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -10.7°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -12.8°C
Wind: WNW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
